title: Air Conditioner, Generously Sized Tubs and Shower with Tile Surrounds
posting_body: ['Helios', '7901 Easte Belleview Avenue, Englewood, CO, 80111', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 92', 'OR Text', '92', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'ENJOY THE LIFE OF LUXURY', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 642 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Helios!', 'We’re an apartment community built for an Englewood lifestyle of social afternoons, daily exercise, and relaxing in your luxurious home.', 'Virtually tour our one- and two-bedroom floor plans with their high ceilings and private patios / balconies - move about the spacious interiors, and welcome in the outside air every day you’re with us.', 'Our residents have access to the amenities they need to meet the lifestyle they deserve.', 'Our community features a fitness center with weights and cardiovascular training equipment, an on-site technology hub, our off-leash dog park, and a sparkling pool.', 'Our community is located in the heart of the Denver Tech Center with Marina Square and Belleview Promenade at your doorstep.', 'Features', '- Custom Wood Cabinets', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Prewired with Fiber Optic and Cable', '- 9- And 10-foot Ceilings*', '- Stainless-steel Appliances*', '- Dishwasher and Disposal', '- Generously Sized Tubs and Shower with Tile Surrounds', '- Wide Plank Flooring*', '- Ceiling Fans Throughout', '- Open Gourmet Kitchens with Island*', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Intrusion Alarms Available for Monitoring*', '- Private Patio or Balconies', '- Tile Backsplashes*', '- Air Conditioner', '- Washer and Dryer', '- Extra Storage', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities', '- Inviting Pool with Landscaped Sundecks', '- Fitness Center with Cardio and Weight Equipment', '- Resident Lounge with Catering Kitchen and Bar', '- Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace and Gas Grills', '- Clubroom with Shuffleboard, Foosball, Pool Table and Large Screen TVs', '- Elevator', '- Business Center', '- Controlled Access/Gated', '- Onsite Management', '- Night Patrol', '- Technology Hub with Fully Connected Computer', '- Off-leash Dog Park', '- Conference Room For Meetings and Calls', '- 24/7 Package Concierge System', '- Guest Room', '- Kitchens', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'PET POLICY', 'We Love Pets!', 'Please review our pet policy.', 'u1AU5tsYuQCw']
